title: Bribe, Gifts, or Commission from Pharmaceutical Companies?
transcript: consider subscribing also my second scenario is what the pharmaceutical companies do wherein they say that you paying us this and we will give you invitation to seminars etc etc if you pay this amount for a certain price or this or that i don't understand your second question i'm saying you know in the pharmaceutical company they say that if you write this antibiotic and they will give you invitations to seminars if you and you get the commission based on this okay i understand i understand this for your question regarding the bribe or the commission that pharmaceutical gives to companies give to a a drug store owner or a physician we've stated this before that if you're working for the owner of the farm the pharmacy or for a clinic you're getting paid for that so anything you get from the pharmaceutical companies would be considered as a bribe you
